div.div:
docs(github): clarify task usage and update npm script names
- Add a note instructing to use #runTasks instead of #runCommands, and update the script names for npm tasks to use the npm: prefix.
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

fix: update flip simulation to use mV, improve layout and responsive design
- Change all voltage values from V to mV in simulation, display, and comparison table - Increase battery simulation container height and add padding for voltage indicators - Adjust voltage indicator and control button positions to prevent overlap - Enhance responsive design for mobile and tablet screens - Update button styles and simulation controls for better accessibility and visibility - All changes verified with git diff
Resolves #layout-overlap
Signed-off-by: Jim Chen <Jim@ChenJ.im>

改善持續電流產生區塊手風琴：垂直布局、更大影片尺寸與使用者控制播放 (#24)
Based on user feedback, this PR significantly improves the accordion feature for the "持續電流產生" (Continuous Current Generation) section by addressing usability and user experience concerns.
## Key Changes Made
###
Layout Improvements - **Vertical Video Layout**: Changed from horizontal side-by-side layout (`md:grid-cols-2`) to vertical stacked layout (`space-y-8`) for better video visibility - **Larger Video Size**: Increased video containers to `max-width: 800px` with centered alignment, making videos much easier to view and interact with - **Better Spacing**: Improved vertical spacing between video segments for cleaner presentation
###
Video Behavior Changes - **Removed Auto-play**: Eliminated `autoplay=1` parameter to respect user preference and avoid intrusive behavior - **Unmuted Audio**: Removed `mute=1` parameter to allow users to hear audio when they choose to play videos - **User-Controlled Playback**: Videos now only play when users explicitly click play, giving them full control - **Maintained Controls**: Kept `controls=1` to ensure users have full video control interface
###
Performance & UX Optimizations - **Removed Loading Animation**: Eliminated loading spinners and related CSS/JavaScript as requested for cleaner interface - **Simplified Code**: Cleaned up unnecessary loading state logic while maintaining error handling - **Enhanced Accessibility**: Better focus management and keyboard navigation support
## Before vs After
**Before**: Small side-by-side videos that auto-played muted, with loading animations **After**: Large vertically-stacked videos that users control, with clean interface
The implementation now provides a much more user-friendly experience where visitors can properly view and interact with the technical explanation videos at their own pace, without being overwhelmed by automatic playback.
<screenshot> ![Updated Accordion Implementation](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/42a9bca6-0859-43f7-b31e-5ae784e68186) </screenshot>
## Technical Details - Maintained responsive design principles for mobile and desktop - Preserved existing accessibility features (ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation) - Fixed all ESLint warnings and maintained code quality standards - Kept backward compatibility with existing functionality
Fixes #23.

Fix video layout and remove autoplay/mute based on user feedback
Co-authored-by: jim60105 <16995691+jim60105@users.noreply.github.com>

Implement accordion with YouTube video embeds for tech details
Co-authored-by: jim60105 <16995691+jim60105@users.noreply.github.com>
Closed #23 實作持續電流產生區塊的技術詳解手風琴與 YouTube 影片嵌入功能
Merged #24 改善持續電流產生區塊手風琴：垂直布局、更大影片尺寸與使用者控制播放
